universities.name: Technical University of Munich
universities.description: Vodeći tehnički univerzitet u Nemačkoj 10 godina zaredom. Direktne veze sa BMW, Siemens, Audi. 50+ Master programa na engleskom. Školarina €2,000-6,000 za non-EU od 2024.

universities.name: LMU Munich
universities.description: 43 Nobelovca. Drugi najveći univerzitet u Nemačkoj. BEZ ŠKOLARINE — samo €137 semestralnih taksi. Jak za medicinu, pravo, fiziku.

universities.name: Heidelberg University
universities.description: Najstariji univerzitet u Nemačkoj (1386). 56 Nobelovaca. Školarina €1,500/sem za non-EU (Baden-Württemberg). Centar izvrsnosti za life sciences.

universities.name: Humboldt University Berlin
universities.description: 55 Nobelovaca uključujući Einsteina. BEZ ŠKOLARINE — €315 semestralne takse. Centar Berlina. Model za moderne istraživačke univerzitete.

universities.name: Freie Universität Berlin
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. Vodeći za političke nauke i Earth Sciences. 20+ Master programa na engleskom. Berlin — najuzbudljiviji grad za studente u Evropi.

universities.name: RWTH Aachen
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. Najveći tehnički univerzitet u Nemačkoj. 45,000 studenata. Direktne veze sa automobilskom industrijom. 35 Master programa na engleskom.

universities.name: KIT Karlsruhe
universities.description: Karlsruhe Institute of Technology. Školarina €1,500/sem (Baden-Württemberg). Vodeći za informatiku i inženjering. Birthplace of the automobile.

universities.name: University of Göttingen
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. 45 Nobelovaca. Istorijski centar matematike i fizike (Gauss, Hilbert, Heisenberg). 20+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: University of Freiburg
universities.description: Osnovan 1457. Školarina €1,500/sem (Baden-Württemberg). Najsunčaniji grad Nemačke. Jak za medicinu, pravo, šumarstvo.

universities.name: TU Berlin
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. 30+ Master programa na engleskom. Centar Berlina. Vodeći za arhitekturu i urban planning u Nemačkoj.

universities.name: TU Dresden
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. 'Silicon Saxony' — centar mikročipova u Evropi. 25+ Master programa na engleskom. Prelepi barokni grad.

universities.name: University of Bonn
universities.description: BEZ ŠKOLARINE. Bivša prestonica Nemačke. Jak za matematiku (#30 globalno) i ekonomiju. UN kampus u gradu.

universities.name: University of Mannheim
universities.description: 'Harvard Nemačke' za biznis i ekonomiju. Školarina €1,500/sem. Barokna palata kao kampus. Jak corporate recruiting.

universities.name: University of Vienna
universities.description: 21 Nobelovaca (Freud, Schrödinger). Najveći u nemačkom govornom području. Samo €752/sem za non-EU. 4 sata od Beograda. Velika srpska zajednica.

universities.name: TU Wien
universities.description: Vodeći tehnički univerzitet u Austriji od 1815. Samo €752/sem. 15 Master programa na engleskom. Centar Beča.

universities.name: University of Innsbruck
universities.description: U srcu Alpa. Samo €752/sem. Vodeći za mountain research, fiziku, turizam. Ski resort bukvalno na kampusu.

universities.name: Graz University of Technology
universities.description: Nikola Tesla studirao ovde. Samo €752/sem. Centar za space technology i automotive. 10+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: Medical University of Vienna
universities.description: Najstariji medicinski fakultet u svetu (1365). Samo €752/sem. Top evropski medicinski research. AKH — jedna od najvećih bolnica u Evropi.

universities.name: WU Vienna
universities.description: Vienna University of Economics and Business. Iconic Zaha Hadid kampus. Samo €752/sem za non-EU. Top MBA u Austriji.

universities.name: ETH Zurich
universities.description: 22 Nobelovca (Einstein alumni). #1 u kontinentalnoj Evropi. CHF 2,190/sem (povećano 2025). World-class za CS, physics, architecture.

universities.name: EPFL Lausanne
universities.description: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne. Najmlađi elite uni u top 10. CHF 2,190/sem. Vodeći za robotiku i AI. Prelep kampus na jezeru.

universities.name: University of Zurich
universities.description: Najveći univerzitet u Švajcarskoj. 12 Nobelovaca. Samo CHF 720/sem. Jak za finansije, medicinu, pravo. Banking hub.

universities.name: University of Geneva
universities.description: UN grad — sedište WHO, WTO, UNHCR. Samo CHF 500/sem! Vodeći za International Relations i diplomacy. French-speaking.

universities.name: University of Basel
universities.description: Najstariji u Švajcarskoj (1460). Samo CHF 850/sem. Pharma hub (Novartis, Roche HQ). Erasmus i Nietzsche alumni.

universities.name: TU Delft
universities.description: #1 u Holandiji. Vodeći za aeronautiku, arhitekturu, robotiku. €18,750-22,150/god za non-EU. 58+ Master programa na engleskom.

universities.name: University of Amsterdam
universities.description: Osnovan 1632. 170+ programa na engleskom — najviše u kontinentalnoj Evropi. €14,000-24,000/god. Centar Amsterdama.

universities.name: Utrecht University
universities.description: Vodeći za life sciences u Holandiji. 115+ programa na engleskom. €13,000-20,000/god. Prelepi srednjovekovni grad.

universities.name: Leiden University
universities.description: Najstariji u Holandiji (1575). 450 godina tradicije. Einstein predavao. €13,000-20,000/god. Vodeći za pravo i IR.

universities.name: Erasmus University Rotterdam
universities.description: Rotterdam School of Management — top 10 u Evropi. €15,000-25,000/god. Port city sa jakom ekonomijom.

universities.name: Wageningen University
universities.description: #1 U SVETU za Agriculture & Forestry već 9 godina! €18,000-20,000/god. Vodeći za food science i sustainability.

universities.name: Eindhoven University of Technology
universities.description: High Tech Campus — 'Smartest km² in Europe'. €15,000-20,000/god. Philips, ASML, NXP partnerships. Innovation hub.

universities.name: Maastricht University
universities.description: Pionir Problem-Based Learning metode. 50% međunarodnih studenata. €13,000-21,000/god. Na granici sa Belgijom i Nemačkom.

universities.name: KU Leuven
universities.description: 600 godina u 2025! Najstariji katolički univerzitet. Samo €4,100-9,500/god za non-EU. 85+ programa na engleskom. #1 u Belgiji.

universities.name: Ghent University
universities.description: Samo €4,000-6,500/god! 80+ programa na engleskom. Vodeći za biotehnologiju, veterinu. Prelepi flamanski grad.

universities.name: UCLouvain
universities.description: Najjeftiniji u Belgiji: €835-4,175/god! French-speaking. Jak za filozofiju, development studies. Georges Lemaître (Big Bang) alumni.

universities.name: Vrije Universiteit Brussel
universities.description: U Briselu — pored EU institucija. €4,000-6,600/god. Odlično za EU policy, political science. Multikulturalni kampus.

universities.name: University of Antwerp
universities.description: €4,000-6,500/god. Port city — vodeći za logistiku i maritime. Diamond industry hub. 50+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: PSL University Paris
universities.description: #1 u Francuskoj. 24 Nobelovaca, 12 Fields medaljista. Javni programi samo €3,770/god! Uključuje ENS, Dauphine, Mines Paris.

universities.name: Institut Polytechnique de Paris
universities.description: Uključuje École Polytechnique — najselektivnija Grande École. €12,000-18,000/god. 120ha kampus. French elite engineering.

universities.name: Sorbonne University
universities.description: Marie Curie legacy. Samo €3,770/god (public)! 53,400 studenata. Istorijski Quartier Latin. 40+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: Université Paris-Saclay
universities.description: Fizika #14 u svetu! Samo €3,770/god. Naučni hub južno od Pariza. 50+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: Sciences Po
universities.description: Elitna Grande École. €10,000-14,500/god. 50% međunarodnih studenata. 7 kampusa širom Francuske. Pipeline za EU karijere.

universities.name: HEC Paris
universities.description: Elitna biznis škola. €25,000-55,000/god. Luxury, consulting, finance placements. LVMH, McKinsey recruiting ground.

universities.name: INSEAD
universities.description: Vodeća svetska biznis škola. Kampusi u Fontainebleau, Singapuru, Abu Dhabiju. 10-mesečni MBA. Top consulting placements.

universities.name: Grenoble Alpes University
universities.description: Samo €3,770/god! Innovation hub u Alpima. GIANT campus. Jak za physics, engineering, AI. Ski resorts na 30 min.

universities.name: University of Oxford
universities.description: 73 Nobelovca. Najstariji univerzitet u anglofonom svetu. £29,500-54,500/god. 39 koledža. Hawking, Thatcher, Wilde alumni.

universities.name: University of Cambridge
universities.description: 120+ Nobelovaca — više od bilo koje institucije. £24,500-64,000/god. 31 koledž. Newton, Darwin, Hawking legacy.

universities.name: Imperial College London
universities.description: STEM focused. £35,100-55,000/god. South Kensington, London. 14 Nobelovaca. Top za medicinu, engineering, computing.

universities.name: UCL
universities.description: Najveći UK univerzitet. £26,200-52,000/god. Centar Londona. Osnovan za one kojima je Oxford/Cambridge bio zatvoren. 1000+ programa.

universities.name: LSE
universities.description: London School of Economics. 72% međunarodnih studenata. £24,000-52,000/god. 18 Nobelovaca. Finance i policy elite.

universities.name: University of Edinburgh
universities.description: Top 5 UK za research. £24,500-35,000/god. Prelepi škotski grad. Vodeći za AI u Evropi. Darwin, Hume, Conan Doyle alumni.

universities.name: University of Manchester
universities.description: #1 za societal impact. £23,000-48,000/god. 25 Nobelovaca. Turing radio ovde. Largest single-site campus UK.

universities.name: King's College London
universities.description: Centar Londona, Strand kampus. £24,000-52,000/god. Vodeći za medicinu i pravo. Florence Nightingale alumni.

universities.name: University of Bristol
universities.description: Russell Group. £23,000-32,000/god. Prelepi grad. Pionir rodne ravnopravnosti (1876). Jak za engineering, sciences.

universities.name: University of Glasgow
universities.description: Osnovan 1451 — četvrti najstariji u UK. £22,000-32,000/god. Adam Smith alumni. Gothic arhitektura. Affordable Scottish city.

universities.name: University of Warwick
universities.description: Warwick Business School — top 20 u svetu. £23,000-35,000/god. Strong industry links. 29,000 studenata.

universities.name: Durham University
universities.description: Collegiate system kao Oxbridge. £23,000-30,000/god. UNESCO World Heritage site. Jak za humanities, sciences.

universities.name: Trinity College Dublin
universities.description: #1 u Irskoj. Oscar Wilde, Beckett alumni. €13,758-29,548/god. Book of Kells. Centar Dablina. 350+ programa.

universities.name: University College Dublin
universities.description: Najveći u Irskoj. €16,800-30,000/god. Silicon Docks veze — Google, Meta, LinkedIn. James Joyce alumni. 300+ programa.

universities.name: University College Cork
universities.description: €14,000-35,000/god. Prelepi južni grad. Jak za farmaciju, nauke, food science. 5x Irish University of the Year.

universities.name: University of Galway
universities.description: €14,000-25,000/god. Na obali Atlantika. Jak za marine science, engineering. Irish language campus. 150+ programa.

universities.name: Dublin City University
universities.description: €12,600-20,000/god. Najmlađi irski univerzitet. Jak industry links. Vodeći za communications, business, education.

universities.name: University of Oslo
universities.description: 5 Nobelovaca. €16,000-22,000/god od 2023 za non-EU (bilo besplatno). Najveći u Norveškoj. 40+ Master na engleskom.

universities.name: NTNU Trondheim
universities.description: Vodeći tehnički u Norveškoj. €12,000-22,000/god. 40+ programa na engleskom. Oil & gas industry veze. Student city.

universities.name: University of Bergen
universities.description: €14,000-22,000/god. Centar za marine biology i climate research. UNESCO Bryggen. Prelepi fjord grad.

universities.name: Lund University
universities.description: Najprestižniji u Skandinaviji. €9,000-26,000/god. Lund Global Scholarship dostupna. 47,000 studenata. Osnovan 1666.

universities.name: KTH Royal Institute of Technology
universities.description: Vodeći tehnički u Skandinaviji. €14,000-28,000/god. Ericsson, Spotify veze. Stockholm — startup hub Evrope.

universities.name: Uppsala University
universities.description: Najstariji u Skandinaviji (1477). €9,000-18,000/god. 8 Nobelovaca. Linnaeus, Celsius alumni. Prelepi student grad.

universities.name: Stockholm University
universities.description: €8,000-13,000/god. U glavnom gradu. National park kampus. Jak za environmental science, ekonomiju.

universities.name: Chalmers University of Technology
universities.description: €13,500-15,500/god. Göteborg — Volvo, SKF, AstraZeneca. IPOET Scholarship dostupna. Jak industry placements.

universities.name: University of Helsinki
universities.description: €13,000-18,000/god. Helsinki Scholarship može pokriti 100% + €10,000! #1 za obrazovanje u svetu. Finski sistem obrazovanja.

universities.name: Aalto University
universities.description: €12,000-17,000/god. Aalto Scholarship pokriva 50-100%. Fusion of art, business, tech. Nokia, Supercell alumni.

universities.name: Tampere University
universities.description: €10,000-15,000/god. Global Student Award: 100% + €7,000/god! Multidisciplinary. Student-friendly grad.

universities.name: University of Copenhagen
universities.description: 9 Nobelovaca. €10,000-17,000/god. Danish Government Scholarship: full tuition + stipend! Niels Bohr alumni.

universities.name: DTU - Technical University of Denmark
universities.description: €15,000/god. Top za sustainable energy. Vestas, Ørsted, Novo Nordisk veze. Copenhagen 30 min away.

universities.name: Aarhus University
universities.description: €8,000-15,300/god. Drugi grad Danske. Danish Government Scholarship dostupna. Jak za political science, business.

universities.name: Copenhagen Business School
universities.description: Top biznis škola Skandinavije. €12,000-20,000/god. 22,000 studenata. Consulting, finance placements.

universities.name: ELTE Budapest
universities.description: 7 Nobelovaca. €2,259-5,000/god. Lingvistika #151-200 globalno. STIPENDIUM HUNGARICUM dostupna za Srbe — potpuno besplatno!

universities.name: Semmelweis University
universities.description: Top evropska medicinska škola. €19,900/god (medicina). Stipendium Hungaricum pokriva! WHO/GMC priznata. 200+ godina tradicije.

universities.name: University of Debrecen
universities.description: €4,000-16,200/god. 80+ programa na engleskom. Stipendium dostupna. Jak za medicinu i agriculture.

universities.name: University of Szeged
universities.description: €4,000-16,000/god. Centar za laser physics. Stipendium dostupna. Nobelovac Albert Szent-Györgyi alumni.

universities.name: BME Budapest
universities.description: Budapest University of Technology. €3,500-5,000/god. Stipendium dostupna. Vodeći za inženjering u regionu.

universities.name: Central European University
universities.description: Soros-founded. €15,000-20,000/god ALI scholarships dostupne. Vodeći za policy, political science, economics u CEE regionu.

universities.name: University of Warsaw
universities.description: #1 u Poljskoj. €2,000-4,000/god. NAWA Banach Scholarship: Srbija izričito eligible! 44+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: Jagiellonian University
universities.description: Najstariji u Poljskoj (1364). €3,500-8,500/god. Krakov — najlepši grad Poljske. Copernicus, Pope John Paul II alumni.

universities.name: Warsaw University of Technology
universities.description: €2,000-4,000/god. Vodeći tehnički u Poljskoj. 20+ programa na engleskom. Aerospace jak.

universities.name: AGH Kraków
universities.description: €2,000-3,500/god. Mining #35 globalno! Metallurgy jak. Krakov lokacija.

universities.name: Medical University of Warsaw
universities.description: €11,500-20,000/god. WHO/GMC accredited. NAWA scholarship moguća. Top za medicinu u CEE.

universities.name: Charles University
universities.description: Najstariji u Centralnoj Evropi (1348)! €3,000-12,000/god za english programe. BESPLATNO na češkom! 178+ doktorskih programa.

universities.name: Czech Technical University
universities.description: CTU Prague. €3,500-5,000/god. Vodeći za inženjering. Nuclear physics jak. Prelepi Prag.

universities.name: Masaryk University
universities.description: €3,000-10,000/god. Brno — tech hub. Jak za informatiku, social sciences. Mlad, dinamičan grad.

universities.name: Brno University of Technology
universities.description: €2,500-4,000/god. IT hub Brno. Jak za arhitekturu i inženjering. Affordable student living.

universities.name: Politecnico di Milano
universities.description: Engineering #21, Architecture #7, Design #6 U SVETU! €3,800-4,200/god. 42+ Master na engleskom. Milano fashion & design capital.

universities.name: University of Bologna
universities.description: NAJSTARIJI UNIVERZITET NA SVETU (1088)! €1,000-3,000/god (income-based). Dante, Petrarch, Copernicus alumni. 50+ Master na engleskom.

universities.name: Sapienza University of Rome
universities.description: NAJVEĆI UNIVERZITET U EVROPI! €300-1,500/god (income-based može biti skoro besplatno!). 59 programa na engleskom. Rim.

universities.name: University of Padua
universities.description: Osnovan 1222. Galileo predavao ovde 18 godina! €500-3,000/god. 40+ programa na engleskom. Prelepi Veneto region.

universities.name: University of Milan
universities.description: €156-2,500/god (može biti skoro besplatno!). 20+ Master na engleskom. Milano — fashion, finance, media capital.

universities.name: Bocconi University
universities.description: Elitna biznis škola. €13,000-15,000/god. Svi programi na engleskom. Top consulting, finance placements. Milano centar.

universities.name: Politecnico di Torino
universities.description: €2,500-3,500/god. FIAT, Ferrari, Maserati veze. Automotive engineering centar Italije. 25+ Master na engleskom.

universities.name: University of Trento
universities.description: €1,500-4,000/god. Vodeći za AI i sustainability u Italiji. Prelepi alpski grad. 15+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: University of Barcelona
universities.description: #1 u Španiji. €3,000-6,000/god. Najveći u Kataloniji. Prelepa Barselona. Jak za medicinu, farmaciju.

universities.name: Autonomous University of Barcelona
universities.description: QS 'Most Improved'. €2,500-5,500/god. Campus Bellaterra. Jak za ekonomiju, CS, veterinu.

universities.name: Autonomous University of Madrid
universities.description: €3,000-5,500/god. Top za physics, biology u Španiji. Green campus. Madrid cost of living niži od Barselone.

universities.name: Pompeu Fabra University
universities.description: Ekonomija #30 u svetu! €3,500-7,500/god. Najmlađi ali najprestižniji. Barcelona beach campus.

universities.name: IE University
universities.description: Madrid. €22,000-85,000/god. Innovation-focused. Jak za tech entrepreneurship. All English.

universities.name: University of Lisbon
universities.description: Najveći u Portugaliji. €3,500-7,000/god. Lisabon — najjeftinija zapadnoevropska prestonica. 30+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: University of Porto
universities.description: €2,750-6,000/god. Research leader. Porto — UNESCO heritage, affordable living, great food & wine.

universities.name: NOVA University Lisbon
universities.description: €4,000-6,000/god. NOVA SBE — triple accredited, top biznis škola. Tech scene Lisabona raste.

universities.name: University of Coimbra
universities.description: UNESCO Heritage kampus (1290). €3,000-5,000/god. Najstariji u Portugaliji. Harry Potter vibes — Hogwarts inspiracija.

universities.name: University of Tartu
universities.description: Najbolji u Baltiku. €3,000-4,000/god. 336+ tuition waivers! E-Estonia, digital government centar. 55+ programa na engleskom.

universities.name: TalTech
universities.description: €2,300-6,000/god. Tallinn University of Technology. Formula Student #1 globalno! Cybersecurity centar. Startup ecosystem.

universities.name: University of Latvia
universities.description: €1,600-6,000/god. Najstariji latvijski (1919). CS #1 u Latviji. Riga — Art Nouveau prestonica Evrope.

universities.name: Riga Technical University
universities.description: €2,600-4,200/god. 50+ programa na engleskom. IT i engineering focus. Affordable Riga living.

universities.name: Riga Stradiņš University
universities.description: €13,500/god (medicina). DVA upisa godišnje! Nema prijemnog ispita. WHO/GMC priznata. Affordable put to MD.

universities.name: Vilnius University
universities.description: Najstariji u Baltiku (1579). €3,000-15,000/god. 50+ programa na engleskom. Vilnius — najbrže rastući tech hub EU.

universities.name: Kaunas University of Technology
universities.description: €3,200-5,600/god. FULL TUITION WAIVERS dostupne! 50+ programa na engleskom. Kaunas — student city.

universities.name: Lithuanian University of Health Sciences
universities.description: €12,600-14,100/god. Specialized medical university. WHO/GMC priznata. Kaunas lokacija, affordable living.

universities.name: University of Bucharest
universities.description: €2,000-4,500/god. Najbolji employment outcomes u Rumuniji. 318 programa. Bukurešt — rastući tech hub.

universities.name: Babeș-Bolyai University
universities.description: €2,200-5,500/god. Najveći rumunski uni. Cluj-Napoca — 'Silicon Valley of Romania'. Tech startups boom.

universities.name: Carol Davila University of Medicine
universities.description: €5,000-10,000/god. WHO/GMC recognized. Nobelovac George Emil Palade alumni. Bukvalno pored Srbije!

universities.name: Politehnica University Bucharest
universities.description: €2,500-4,000/god. Vodeći tehnički u Rumuniji. IT outsourcing hub — dobre job opportunities.

universities.name: West University of Timișoara
universities.description: €2,000-3,500/god. DIREKTNE VEZE iz Srbije! Timišoara — European Capital of Culture 2023. 2h od Beograda.

universities.name: Sofia University
universities.description: €2,824-7,700/god. Najstariji u Bugarskoj. Living costs €300-500/mesečno — NAJJEFTINIJE u EU! Srpski lako razumljiv.

universities.name: Medical University Sofia
universities.description: €8,000-9,000/god. GMC/WHO recognized. Affordable path to MD. Bugarski sličan srpskom — lakša adaptacija.

universities.name: Medical University Plovdiv
universities.description: €8,000-10,000/god. Plovdiv — European Capital of Culture. Kulturni grad, affordable. GMC/WHO recognized.

universities.name: Technical University Sofia
universities.description: €3,000-4,000/god. Najveći tehnički u Bugarskoj. IT outsourcing industrija raste — dobre job šanse.

universities.name: National and Kapodistrian University of Athens
universities.description: Medicina #102 globalno. ~€1,500/god. Najstariji na Balkanu. Atina — cradle of Western civilization. Orthodox heritage.

universities.name: Aristotle University of Thessaloniki
universities.description: €1,500-2,000/god. NAJVEĆI u Grčkoj. Solun — 5h od Beograda. Living costs €450-750/mesečno — najniže u Evropi!

universities.name: National Technical University of Athens
universities.description: €0-1,800/god. Civil Engineering #50 globalno! Vodeći tehnički u Grčkoj. Atina kombinuje istoriju i modernost.

universities.name: Athens University of Economics and Business
universities.description: €2,000-4,000/god. #1 biznis škola u Grčkoj. Dobri finance placements. Atina centar.

universities.name: University of Ljubljana
universities.description: #1 u Sloveniji i na Balkanu. €2,000-5,000/god. Ljubljana — 4h od Beograda! Prelepi alpski grad. Srpski razumljiv.

universities.name: University of Maribor
universities.description: €2,000-4,000/god. Drugi najveći. Blizu austrijske granice. Jak za inženjering. Wine region — Štajerska.
